changeSet.author: ivanursul
changeSet.createView: SELECT COALESCE(zno.zno_score_sum, 0) + COALESCE(certificate.certification_sum * s.weight_certification, 0) + COALESCE(mse.markexchange * s.weight_award, 0) AS kb, zno.zno_score_sum, certificate.certification_sum, s.weight_certification, mse.markexchange, s.weight_award, e.enrolmentId as enrolment_id FROM q_dc_enrolment e LEFT OUTER JOIN q_ob_specoffer s ON e.specoffer_id = s.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- бали за зно, посумовані SELECT SUM(mse.markexchange * ss.weightsubject) AS zno_score_sum, ees.enrolment_id FROM q_dt_enrolmentenrolsubject ees LEFT OUTER JOIN q_dc_enrolment ei ON ees.enrolment_id = ei.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_ob_specoffer si ON ei.specoffer_id = si.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_specoffersubject ss ON ss.specoffer_id = si.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_markscaleexchange mse ON ees.markscale_id = mse.markscale_id AND markmin <= ees.mark AND markmax >= ees.mark LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_personenrolsubject pes ON ees.personenrolsubject_id = pes.enrolmentId GROUP BY ees.enrolment_id ) zno ON zno.enrolment_id = e.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Бали з атестату, не помножені на ваговий коефіцієнт SELECT mse.markexchange AS certification_sum, pp.person_id FROM q_od_personpaper pp LEFT OUTER JOIN q_rf_papertype pt ON pt.enrolmentId = pp.papertype_id LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_markscaleexchange mse ON pp.markscale_id = mse.markscale_id AND markmin <= pp.mark AND markmax >= pp.mark WHERE pt.name = 'Атестат про повну загальну середню освіту' ) certificate ON certificate.person_id = e.person_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Всі решта бали(дивись фільтрування) SELECT MAX(ees.enrolmentId) AS enrolmentId, --mse.markexchange AS award_score, ees.enrolment_id FROM q_dt_enrolmentenrolsubject ees LEFT OUTER JOIN q_dc_enrolment ei ON ees.enrolment_id = ei.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_ob_specoffer si ON ei.specoffer_id = si.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_personenrolsubject pes ON ees.personenrolsubject_id = pes.enrolmentId WHERE ees.personaward_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ees.enrolment_id ) other ON other.enrolment_id = e.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_dt_enrolmentenrolsubject aees ON aees.enrolmentId = other.enrolmentId LEFT OUTER JOIN q_od_markscaleexchange mse ON aees.markscale_id = mse.markscale_id AND mse.markmin <= aees.mark AND mse.markmax >= aees.mark

changeSet.createView: SELECT e.enrolmentId as enrolment_id, e.specoffer_id AS specoffer_id, score.kb as kb, kvota_mon.priority AS priority FROM q_dc_enrolment e LEFT OUTER JOIN v_dc_enrolment_contest_score score ON e.enrolmentId = score.enrolment_id INNER JOIN q_dt_enrolmentbenefit eb ON eb.enrolment_id = e.enrolmentId INNER JOIN ( SELECT eb.enrolment_id, bt.priority, bt.name FROM q_dt_enrolmentbenefit eb INNER JOIN q_ob_benefit b ON b.enrolmentId = eb.benefit_id INNER JOIN q_rf_benefittype bt ON b.benefittype_id = bt.enrolmentId WHERE bt.priority = 4 ) kvota_mon ON kvota_mon.enrolment_id = e.enrolmentId ORDER BY score.kb
